attributes.additional_details: We are calling for the sacking of anna marie crampton who is a UKIP member..we are horrified and angered at her Nazi comments about the holocust!!..UKIP cannot have a member like her on their team it will not succeed..we demand that anna marie crampton to stand trial in the EU court of law and brought to justice about her slanderous comments against christains and jews.it is a disgrace that a british person is so uneducated and evil.
